page.title: 05MR.I.THORNE. KNEESALL.
page.content: { Mr Ian Thorne}came to live at Lound Farm six years ago.The farm is between Kneesall and Ompton, just off the A616 main road.After the farm was altered and renovated it was renamed Beauchamp Barn.Mr Thorne is the owner of much of the land around Kneesall, which belongs to the{Thoresby Estate.}Mr Thorne is the representative of the {Manvers}family who have owned the land for many generations.He is the first member of the family to live in the Kneesall area, as the family seat was at Thoresby Hall 7kms northwestwards. After a career in the Army in the Grenadiers, where Mr Thorne served abroad, he returned to take over family responsibility for the estate.His present interests include the Scout movement,the Country Landowners' Association and aspects of timber conservation.
